name: Reverse Nordic Curl
how_to_perform:
1. Hold a barbell or dumbbells with your palms facing your body and sit on a bench, leaning back slightly.
2. Keeping your upper arm still, lift the weight up by bending your elbow until it reaches your shoulder blade, drawing your shoulder blades together as you go.
3. Lower the weight back to the starting position without releasing your grip or letting the weight swing behind you.
4. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions
short_summary: Reverse Nordic curls are an exercise that targets the brachialis muscle.
